If there's no serial number, there's a couple things I do.
First, I check TBP for torrents for keygens or serial generators for either that specific program or for whole program families (like Adobe for example).

If it's not on here, then google the same thing. Look up "keygens". 

So far, I've been able to download one for everything I've used so far with no problems.

Now, that's using a PC, not a Mac. But I can't imagine why the same thing wouldn't work for mac too.

Hope that helps.

Okay, let me clear this up. This torrent does work -- and it's fairly fast for me. When you are installing it, the serials provided earlier work just fine (i'll repost them here.) You'll need them all. But you should not, and can not, install everything. When it asks you what to install, UNCHECK EVERYTHING THAT IS NOT "FINAL CUT PRO". Then install will run fine. DO NOT REGISTER THE PRODUCT, click 'register later'.

Everything for Final Cut Pro is here -- but if you want LiveType and Soundtrack, which are technically separate programs in the FC Studio package, you'll need another torrent.

Serials needed:
Serial: D-343-CLH-206-QGO-350-IQL-134-RXN-STP
DVD StudioPro3: C-342-SQZ-170-EAZ-340-AKZ-170-RMQ-PDY
FinalcutPro HD C-341-JEJ-170-WFU-341-VKV-170-RSZ-PDN
Motion: C-340-YFL-170-JST-340-WKJ-170-RRY-QVW

Enjoy.
